CN.content:

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Up to now , the highest PCE of μmR - polymer was just 1.1% , based on poly(di-2-thienylthienopyrazine) by using complicated doubled active layers photovoltaic devices.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Name" entities in the paragraph are:

1. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)
2. μmR (micro-molar concentration of the polymer)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to Material Property in the given paragraph:

1. PCE (Power Conversion Efficiency)
2. μmR (micro-molar concentration of the polymer)

The entity "poly(di-2-thienylthienopyrazine)" refers to a specific material, but it is not a property of the material. Therefore, it is not considered a Material Property entity in this context.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities in the paragraph, presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCE |
| μmR |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Up to now , the highest PCE of μmR - polymer was just 1.1% , based on poly(di-2-thienylthienopyrazine) by using complicated doubled active layers photovoltaic devices.

Let's think step by step.

The "Property Value" entities in the paragraph are:

1. 1.1% - the highest PCE (power conversion efficiency) of μmR-polymer.
2. poly(di-2-thienylthienopyrazine) - the material with the highest PCE.
3. doubled active layers photovoltaic devices - the type of device used to achieve the highest PCE.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that clearly refer to the value of a material property:

1. 1.1% - the highest PCE (power conversion efficiency) of μmR-polymer.
2. poly(di-2-thienylthienopyrazine) - the material with the highest PCE.

The entity "doubled active layers photovoltaic devices" does not directly refer to the value of a material property, so it can be removed from the list.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid entities presented as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 1.1% |
| poly(di-2-thienylthienopyrazine) |

Note that I've kept the entities as they were in the original paragraph, without any modification or simplification.
